Mobius Special Thanks Bread Lounge, Pizzanista, Blue Star
~In loving memory of the American Tea Room~
Alex thanks: Peter Brinson, David Pierce, Loan Verneau, and Tracy Fullerton (wisdom), Masi Oka and everyone at Mobius (power), Janet, Steve, Kelsey, and Erin Beachum (courage)
Loan thanks: ma famille, la meilleure au monde parce que j'ai eut la chance de la choisir: Ylian, Anna, Michel, Valérie, Billy S., Sèv, Sarken, Justine, Damien, Alex et bien entendu Super Moine.
Wesley thanks: Hilma, James, Michael and Philip Martin, Michelle Bol, Mitchell Loofbourrow, Sandy Appleoff, The Elsinore Team.
Logan thanks: My parents, Ansel, and Jason; Alex Mathew and Jacob Pernell; Jeremy Gibson and Tracy Fullerton; and Alex Beachum, Loan Verneau, and Avimaan Syam for pulling me aboard a train I thought I'd missed.
Jeffrey thanks: My family, especially my sister Kathryn
Lara thanks: Nora, Brian, and Shawn

section.name: LaraJokeThanks
section.layout:
Lara also thanks FALOTI Executive Outcomes for all the laughs and camaraderie.
Lara anti-thanks the fact that all of the credit columns are permanantly center-justified and had to be aligned manually. Yeah you read that right. I manually added spaces to everything to make it look like normal credits. It looked reeeeaaally bad otherwise, man! It was totally unreadable!! So if you looked at this game's credits and went ''yeah these are just, your completely average regular credits'' that was me. But just that part, I didn't code the stuff that makes it scroll. Oh, while I'm chattin' up a storm, did you find my easter egg? My actual easter egg, not this!
Credits Coder Note 1: ISSUE CLOSED COULD NOT REPRODUCE

Eilish thanks: Mum and Pop, and Emily.
Ian thanks: Mom and Dad, the rest of the fam, the homies.
Kelsey Beachum thanks: Jon Moore, Erin Beachum, Alex and Loan (you lunatics), Steve and Janet Beachum, and every last one of you who rooted for us to pull this off.
Satrio thanks: Mama, Papa, Ifan. My mentors: José, Peter, Richard, Andreas. In memory of Oom Erwin (1968 - 2021), uncle and inspiration.
Kelsey Rice thanks: My family as well as Elliott Mahler, Peter Brinson, Josh Scherr, Maureen McHugh, and David White. Y'all are the best!
Jon thanks: Mom, Dad, my brother Greg, Alex Freeman, Stacy Walker, and my cat Comet
Akash thanks: Max Duggan for additional sound design
